preqs: Approval to enrol in this unit will only be given after consultation with the unit leader.  Students must have completed 24 credit points of marketing units.

rules.ruleString: (Permission required and  Must have passed 24 credit points)
Unit was previously coded {MKF3631, MKT363, MKT3631, MKW3631, MKX3631%}
Unit was previously coded {MKF3631, MKT363, MKT3631, MKW3631, MKX3631%}

description: This unit aims to give students first-hand experience of working in an industry in which they would like to be employed on graduation. Internships are designed to provide students with an opportunity to integrate marketing theory with business practice. Separate internship programs are drawn up for each student
